page.title: 04BEIGHTON VILLAGE.
page.content: Beighton is situated in South Yorkshire,near Sheffield.It has only one school,which is a Junior and Infant.There are a lot of shopping amenities.There is a doctor's surgery and health centre and one dentist. In July 1985 there was an appeal in the village to raise money for buying a vicarage. When all the money is raised,(a total of Â£196,000 is needed) the vicarage will be converted into a community centre. The vicarage,(which already has 12 rooms),will have a dance floor,games room,keep-fit area and coffee bar. {Clubs in Beighton-}there is a sports club,which has its own playing ground, one night-club, a health centre and a dance club.{New housing-}there are five or six new housing estates being built leading to increased population & a growing village.
